snippet: The Boxing Hall of Fame’s class of 2015 will include the lightweight Ray Mancini, the heavyweight Riddick Bowe, the featherweight Naseem Hamed and the light flyweight Yoko Gushiken.
abstract: Boxing Hall of Fame’s class of 2015 will include lightweight Ray Mancini, heavyweight Riddick Bowe, featherweight Naseem Hamed and light flyweight Yoko Gushiken.
lead_paragraph: The Boxing Hall of Fame’s class of 2015 will include the lightweight Ray Mancini, the heavyweight Riddick Bowe, the featherweight Naseem Hamed and the light flyweight Yoko Gushiken.

headline.main: Hall of Fame Class of 2015 Is Announced
headline.print_headline: Hall of Fame Class of 2015 Announced
